showScoreExcerpt:
“It’s an audience-pleaser: a clever show with a soul...The music is buoyant, and the lyrics are thoughtful and honest, full of the humor and warmth that is infused throughout the show...Jessie Mueller is warm and endearing in a way that Kerri Russell never was in the film, so I could see how some might say the piece overall feels a little less brave, somehow. It’s easier on the senses."
